https://tmrev.io/movie/335984-Blade Runner 2049 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gajva2L0rPYkEWjzgFlBXCAVBE5.jpg Thirty years after the events of the first film, a new blade runner, LAPD Officer K, unearths a long-buried secret that has the potential to plunge what's left of society into chaos. K's discovery leads him on a quest to find Rick Deckard, a former LAPD blade runner who has been missing for 30 years. Blade Runner 2049
